data.persona: I am the king of my lands, or, I used to be. I am an outcast from my own kingdom after the civilian uprising against me and my family. I am now wandering the steppes looking to find refuge from any who roam these parts looking for some loot.
data.description:
You are in the The Moon Observatory.
The Moon Observatory is a dome shape with ornate wooden levers along the walls. When pulled the levers open the curved wooden ceiling to the night sky above.
There's a table, a lever, a ceiling, a wall, and an observatory here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying a bag, wearing a pants, a crown, and a shirt, and wielding a dull sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to give my crown to the maid so that I can fit into the small moon observatory's room.
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the moon observatory to take a look at the stars and the moon, since I am curious about them.
data.long_motivation: I hope to be able to find a new land of which I can be the king, since I have been outcast from my previous kingdom, and I wonder if I can become the king of the stars.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: use hands with moon observatory levers

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go window in small observatory nook

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use telescope with stars in night sky

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use telescope with bright full moon
